title: I want to become ethical hacker in future . What subject should I chose in class 11? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, I will be happy to answer your question. If you have computer related subject in your school then choose it in 11 it will help you a lot if you don't have then start learning about Computers by yourself. I am not saying that it will help you to become an ethical hacker but a step towards ethical hacker. I recommend you to start knowing the new technical keywords and start to understand the working of technologies. That's enough for you at that stage.

Hello, Choose Computer science. Get yourself build properly in the basics. But keep in mind choosing the Computer science is not just make you a hacker. But it ll be helpful for you in the future. Thanks
